mapper.select: SELECT (case when DEPT_NAME='碎矿设备' THEN '设备' WHEN DEPT_NAME='碎矿生产' THEN '生产' WHEN DEPT_NAME='电仪工段' THEN '电仪' END )section, count(COMPLETESTATE = 'Y' OR NULL) AS checked, count(COMPLETESTATE = 'W' OR NULL) AS unchecked, count(ALTPID = 1 OR NULL) AS alarm, count(ALTPID = 2 OR NULL) AS danger FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE ( (DEPT_NAME="碎矿设备" AND devName="2#皮带运输机") OR (DEPT_NAME="电仪工段" AND devName="2#皮带运输机电机") OR (DEPT_NAME="碎矿生产" AND devName="2#皮带运输机")) AND -- YEARWEEK(date_format(TASKSTART_TM, '%Y-%m-%d'),1) = YEARWEEK(now(), 1) -- 一周数据（测试用） to_days(TASKSTART_TM) = to_days(now()) -- 当天数据 GROUP BY section
